quote: You understand the logic behind the illogical, Alyssa. It's in your nature to find tranquility amid the madness. And that's what we're doing here. We are giving our food a fighting chance.
quote_letters: YOU UNDERSTAND THE LOGIC BEHIND THE ILLOGICAL ALYSSA ITS IN YOUR NATURE TO FIND TRANQUILITY AMID THE MADNESS AND THATS WHAT WERE DOING HERE WE ARE GIVING OUR FOOD A FIGHTING CHANCE
